claim: The date of the youngest user's first post is August 9, 2010.
extra_info: the youngest user refers to MIN(Age); first post refers to MIN(CreaionDate);
reasoning: The youngest user (Age=13, UserId=805) has a first post date (MIN(CreaionDate)) of 2010-08-09, which matches the claimed date of August 9, 2010.

CREATE TABLE users
(

        primary key,

    CreationDate    DATETIME     null,
    DisplayName     TEXT null,
    LastAccessDate  DATETIME     null,
    WebsiteUrl      TEXT null,
    Location        TEXT null,
    AboutMe         TEXT     null,
    Views           INTEGER          null,
    UpVotes         INTEGER          null,
    DownVotes       INTEGER          null,
    AccountId       INTEGER          null,
    Age             INTEGER          null,
    ProfileImageUrl TEXT null
);

content.content:
CREATE TABLE posts
(
    Id                    INTEGER          not null UNIQUE
        primary key,
    PostTypeId            INTEGER          null,
    AcceptedAnswerId      INTEGER          null,
    CreaionDate           DATETIME     null,
    Score                 INTEGER          null,
    ViewCount             INTEGER          null,
    Body                  TEXT     null,
    OwnerUserId           INTEGER          null,
    LasActivityDate       DATETIME     null,
    Title                 TEXT null,
    Tags                  TEXT null,
    AnswerCount           INTEGER          null,
    CommentCount          INTEGER          null,
    FavoriteCount         INTEGER          null,
    LastEditorUserId      INTEGER          null,
    LastEditDate          DATETIME     null,
    CommunityOwnedDate    DATETIME    null,
    ParentId              INTEGER          null,
    ClosedDate            DATETIME     null,
    OwnerDisplayName      TEXT null,
    LastEditorDisplayName TEXT null,
        foreign key (LastEditorUserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (OwnerUserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (ParentId) references posts (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

content.text: Good, I can see the `users` table has an `Age` column and the `posts` table has `CreaionDate` (note the typo). Now let me find the youngest user and their first post date.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/codebase_community.sqlite" "SELECT u.Id, u.Age, MIN(p.CreaionDate) as FirstPostDate FROM users u JOIN posts p ON u.Id = p.OwnerUserId WHERE u.Age = (SELECT MIN(Age) FROM users) GROUP BY u.Id;"
input.description: Find youngest user(s) and their first post date

content.text:
The youngest user has Age = 13, User Id = 805, and their first post date (MIN(CreaionDate)) is **2010-08-09 00:37:45.0**, which is indeed **August 9, 2010**.

The claim states "The date of the youngest user's first post is August 9, 2010," which matches the data exactly.
